name: Duel (itch) (Sanchit Gulati)
description:
Duel, is open development project, where we take your inputs and feedback on every iterative build.

Play with your friends, record some game play video (if you can ?) and share them back. And we love your feedback, so whether it's good or bad ? Or you have some ideas for the game ? Or if you could pin point what was missing ? do write to us through comments.

We would be happy to follow up and improve upon this game.

# build 0.1 : is first working draft with the basic mechanism. Still enjoyable with friends and family.
